title: Black Loading Screen And Game Crash
body: Hello. I wasn on a trip 2 weeks and i did not played lol . When i came home i wanted to play. I chosed my champ and i couldn't get into the loading screen. When tried to alt+tab it wrote network connection failed and then game crashed i had the button to reconnect but when i pressed it i came back in the same black screen and then at the error . I reinstalled lol and tried then but nothing changed . Help please i wanna play again .

replies.body: It sounds like your computer has an unstable connection and can't reach our game server.  I recommend going over our [Connection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to troubleshoot this.  Good luck, and welcome back!
